column1: 272113,Family and Marriage Counsellor,,"Counsel clients or patients regarding personal issues
column5: Teach life skills or strategies to clients or their families
column9: Develop treatment plans for patients or clients
column13: Interview clients to gather information about their backgrounds, needs or progress
column15: Confer with clients to discuss treatment plans or progress
column17: Support individuals with diverse needs to understand, access and utilise information or services
column19: Maintain a working understanding of the cultural, diversity and accessibility needs of others, and how this applies to the role
column21: Supervise workers providing client or patient services
column23: Collaborate with other professionals to assess client needs or plan treatments
column25: Counsel clients or patients with substance abuse issues
column27: Help clients get needed services or resources
column29: Monitor clients to evaluate treatment progress
column31: Evaluate the effectiveness of counselling or educational programs
column35: Advise others on social or educational issues
column37: Present social services program information to the public
